content: This is just to let Backdrop community know that AltaGrade has secured the domain name backdrop.ru for Russian-speaking users of Backdrop. At the moment, the website https://www.backdrop.ru is pretty empty and most probably will be like that for quite long time, because there are not so many Russian users. However, the domain name was there for sale and we grabbed it for future use.

However, the domain name was there for sale and we grabbed it for future use.

World domination! :rofl:
No, seriously, many thanks to AltaGrade for keeping an eye on interesting domains.

because there are not so many Russian users.

Even not so many Russian-spoken users! :rolling_on_the_floor_laughing: :+1:
Due to lack of Russian users, maybe we can repurpose the domain to something like: we-are.backdrop.ru :big_smile:

BWPanda said:

Due to lack of Russian users, maybe we can repurpose the domain to something like: we-are.backdrop.ru :big_smile:

the-day-backdrop-will-start-thriving-this-will-be-just.backdrop.ru is even better :wink:
What was said is done: 2021-01-24_23-06.png
In fact, the domain is https://the-day-backdrop-starts-thriving-this-will-be-just.backdrop.ru now. Had to correct my English grammar.
